long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to improving your cognitive strength for reading. By using a font that triggers system 2 thinking of your brain. 
Sources
Font in cognitive reflection test
http://pages.stern.nyu.edu/~aalter/intuitive.pdf
Fonts and cognitive strain
http://rady.ucsd.edu/faculty/seminars/2010/papers/oppenheimer.pdf
